mapper.select: select prod_chk_no, fct_cd, chk_dt, chk_rslt, msr_mtt, msr_cmt, PKG_MAKE_CODE.CODE('FRC', 'FCT_PROD_CHK', 'PROD_CHK_NO') as predictProdChkNo from fct_prod_chk where ROWNUM =1

select DISTINCT f.chk_prod, f.chk_prod_unit, case when f.chk_prod_unit = 'Y' then to_char(add_months(sysdate, (f.chk_prod * 12)),'yyyy-mm-dd') when f.chk_prod_unit = 'M' then to_char(add_months(sysdate, f.chk_prod), 'yyyy-MM-dd') when f.chk_prod_unit = 'W' then to_char(sysdate + (f.chk_prod * 7), 'yyyy-MM-dd') when f.chk_prod_unit = 'D' then to_char(sysdate + f.chk_prod, 'yyyy-MM-dd') end as chkExpectDt from fct_prod_chk p join fct_info f on p.fct_cd = f.fct_cd where p.fct_cd = #{fctCd}

select a.* ,b.* from (select a.*, (to_date(chkExpectDt, 'yyyy-MM-dd') - trunc(sysdate)) as day_diff from (SELECT distinct p.fct_cd as fctCd, p.prod_chk_no as prodChkNo, f.fct_nm as fctNm, (select max(chk_dt) from fct_prod_chk where chk_dt = p.chk_dt) as chkDt, p.chk_rslt as chkRslt, p.msr_mtt as msrMtt, p.msr_cmt as msrCmt, case when f.chk_prod_unit = 'Y' then to_char(add_months((select max(chk_dt) from fct_prod_chk where chk_dt = p.chk_dt), (f.chk_prod * 12)), 'yyyy-MM-dd') when f.chk_prod_unit = 'M' then to_char(add_months((select max(chk_dt) from fct_prod_chk where chk_dt = p.chk_dt), f.chk_prod), 'yyyy-MM-dd') when f.chk_prod_unit = 'W' then to_char((select max(chk_dt) from fct_prod_chk where chk_dt = p.chk_dt) + (f.chk_prod * 7), 'yyyy-MM-dd') when f.chk_prod_unit = 'D' then to_char((select max(chk_dt) from fct_prod_chk where chk_dt = p.chk_dt) + f.chk_prod, 'yyyy-MM-dd') end as chkExpectDt, chk_prod, chk_prod_Unit From fct_prod_chk p, fct_info f WHERE p.fct_cd= f.fct_cd) a where chkExpectDt >= to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-MM-dd') and chkExpectDt < = to_char(sysdate + 7, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) a join (SELECT p.fct_cd as fctCd, f.fct_nm as fctNm, p.chk_rslt as chkRslt, max(case when f.chk_prod_unit = 'Y' then to_char(add_months((select max(chk_dt) from fct_prod_chk where chk_dt = p.chk_dt), (f.chk_prod * 12)), 'yyyy-MM-dd') when f.chk_prod_unit = 'M' then to_char(add_months((select max(chk_dt) from fct_prod_chk where chk_dt = p.chk_dt), f.chk_prod), 'yyyy-MM-dd') when f.chk_prod_unit = 'W' then to_char((select max(chk_dt) from fct_prod_chk where chk_dt = p.chk_dt) + (f.chk_prod * 7), 'yyyy-MM-dd') when f.chk_prod_unit = 'D' then to_char((select max(chk_dt) from fct_prod_chk where chk_dt = p.chk_dt) + f.chk_prod, 'yyyy-MM-dd') end) as chkExpectDt From fct_prod_chk p, fct_info f WHERE p.fct_cd= f.fct_cd group by p.fct_cd , f.fct_nm , p.chk_rslt) b on a.fctCd = b.fctCd and a.chkexpectdt=b.chkexpectdt
